Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
ServerHandler
public class ServerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
ServerHandler handles a priority queue of customers and updates the server and queue based on the server's response.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerHandler

      public ServerHandler()

  • Method Details

    • handleAll

      public static void handleAll​(int serverNo, java.util.PriorityQueue<Event> customers)
      ServerHandler has a static method handleAll that should be responsible for most of the logic. It enquires each Event's status, enquires the server on what the Event should be updated to and then updates the servers and the customers priority queue accordingly.
      Parameters:
      serverNo - number of servers
      customers - priority queue of customers that the server has to manage

    • generateServers

      private static java.util.ArrayList<Server> generateServers​(int serverNo)
      Generates an arraylist of servers.
      Parameters:
      serverNo - Number of servers.
      Returns:
      An arraylist of servers.

    • chooseServer

      private static java.util.Optional<Server> chooseServer​(Event c, java.util.ArrayList<Server> servers)
      Scans through arraylist of servers and chooses one or none.
      Parameters:
      c - Event that has arrived and needs to be handled.
      servers - Arraylist of servers.
      Returns:
      an optional that contains either a server or null.

    • handleServedCustomer

      private static void handleServedCustomer​(ServeEvent currc, java.util.ArrayList<Server> servers, java.util.PriorityQueue<Event> customers)
      Based on a Event that has been served, modifies a server and a Event.
      Parameters:
      currc - Event that has been served and needs to be changed to DoneEvent.
      servers - Arraylist of servers.
      customers - PriorityQueue of customers.

    • handleWaitCustomer

      private static void handleWaitCustomer​(WaitEvent currc, java.util.ArrayList<Server> servers, java.util.PriorityQueue<Event> customers)
      Based on a Event that is waiting, modifies a server and a Event.
      Parameters:
      currc - Event that is waiting and needs to be changed to ServeEvent.
      servers - Arraylist of servers.
      customers - PriorityQueue of customers.
